The 24-hour news cycle might be the worst thing to happen to the modern world. No one cares about news anymore when they get so much manure shoved in their ears. The solution: apps like this, that combine all the headlines from the major news outlets. I listen daily.
The best option for world news since the good old days of short wave broadcasting.

Interesting app but I have finally uninstalled it... for good! It's crashing way too often. I have uninstalled and reinstalled that app many times during the last years and months. My conclusion: A news podcast subscriptions playlist is a more flexible and reliable option compared to this app. Note to the developer: No use sending me a passive-agressive message or comments, I'm really tired of your attitude and customer service approach. I'm done with you.
great app for keeping up with current events

I have been using this app for years, and it is my primary source of News daily. You can pick the sources of news you want, and simply play those news briefings in your play all list. I am very happy to not have to watch television news any longer and to choose sources I trust for news. And even, sometimes, sources I may not trust, but which I can judge by my own understanding and logic.

content: Customer support was pretty awesome. Had a rough start with this app not working great. They recognized the issue, which was actually triggered by the Android OS. The Battery optimization feature has been causing issues on many apps not working as they did before. But they understood this as the root cause and indeed it was. This app is working beautifully now. Once again, in love with this app!
replyContent: I will definitely give you a refund.  My take - Android 9 moved the goal posts for stability. A huge challenge is that to simply maintain the app with changes in Android costs more than our one-time fee. We do update the app yearly to deal with new errors mostly created by Google changes. Send us an email for refund: comments@1radionews.com

content: The news the way you want it from the world. Use play mix to select and order the stations that you want to hear. I need the news in the morning, and 1 Radio  delivers it my way.

content: Thanks for such a comprehensive program

content: For those who love information and news radio, this is a must have.

content: I use this app every day - mostly because there aren't any other good alternatives.  It has great potential.  I very much appreciate the large volume of stations available, & the developer's efforts but there are several issues that I constantly deal with and some missing features that keep me from rating it higher.  I'd gladly give this app 5 stars if these issues were fixed/updated: 1.)  Stations on the playmix regularly fail.  Some stations just stop playing after a while and are skipped.  This only seems to occur on the playmix. If I remove the station from the playmix & re-add it usually works.  And then I have to go back into my playmix settings and put the station back in the order I want.   2.) No search function.  If the above issue occurs, it can be a big hassle to have to scroll through the full list of stations to find the station to add it again.  The frustration is further magnified by: 3.) Frequent crashes when scrolling through stations. 4.) No playback controls except play/pause.  Sometimes I would like to rewind or fast forward or skip to where I left off if I leave the app.   The Hourly News app on iOS allows this and it uses many of the same feeds.
replyContent: Would love to earn another star! Feedback please: comments@1radionews.com

content: This is my go-to app for world radio news. Beautifully curated station list with really fast connection, makes station switching painless. No more searching around in other net radio apps. A job well done. Only have one criticism, sometimes scrolling doesn't detect my swipes, other than that, this is a fantastic app.
replyContent: Thanks! Quickly changing the station is a must if it really is radio.

content: Just superb, it reminds me of the day I spent listening to shortwave radio, please do not destroy this wonderful app.

content: Without revealing my political leanings,  I as so many others, are very tired of being hoodwinked and led by the nose by the mainstream. content: My phone is my most used learning tool. I bought the pro app before the most recent update specifically to support the excellent work. Simple to use and useful for anyone who wishes to stay informed and stimulated by the rich diversity of knowledge and news that this globe of ours offers. Excellent selection of channels, big and small, from the US as well as overseas. Sample the free app but if you like to learn and stay up to date I recommend going pro!
replyContent: "for anyone who wishes to stay informed and stimulated by the rich diversity of knowledge and news that this globe of ours offers" - I'm inspired by that comment. Thanks, Steve ... let's learn about the world together!

content: This application was good and it just got better. Lots more channels and with a Favorites Channel section,  your favorite radio channels are easier to access. Thanks. The Best radio app. Thanks for the great update.
replyContent: Glad you like the new favorites PlayMix! I've clustered my daily favorites and weekly shows in groups. This is fun. Steve, your 1 Radio News guide

content: Superb app

It's frustrating when you want a radio news update and its not the top of the hour. 1 Radio News is the answer to on-demand news! And it does so much more. Support the development of this brilliant app by investing a few pennies in the pro version - you won't regret it :)
replyContent: Exactly. Convenient and quick access to hourly (actually half-hourly with BBC) was our motivation when we started. Steve, your 1 Radio News chief bottlewasher

content: Great App ! Great Developer! Love this app!
replyContent: Thanks a bazillion!

content: This app puts the world at my fingertips. Simple interface and fast loading. Selection is also brilliant and convenient, there's something for everyone. Worth every cent, highly recommended if you're a news junkie or an old-school SWL'er. **Update** 2/9/16 Great job with adding favorites, solid feature. Occasionally crashes when I scroll through the stations.
replyContent:
Try the manual update stations option and let me know asap if that helps: comments@1radionews.com

Also send us more info. We haven't updated the app since August, so it could be something else on your phone. However, as we've just added a few shows and icons to the station list, let’s check that first.

content: This app is like a miracle.
replyContent: Finding the "best" stations and shows is key. We spend hundreds of hours digging so our listeners could have instant access to the best news radio in English from 63 countries and counting. Spread the word.

content: Old school news consumers rejoice! Great selection, fast to load....100% 5 stars!  The upgrade was the best $1.99 Ive ever spent. My old shortwave has largely been  gathering dust, as few english language broadcasters remain on the medium. Without a doubt one of my favorite apps. Would be lost w/o it. Many many thanks! Folks that love this app need to check out World Live News 24, streams almost all the major live international  News broadcasters video streams. If you have both you have it all

I love listening to international news and radio and this app includes all of the stations you would want as an English listener and more.  Looking forward to some of the proposed feature enhancements.

A little rough around the edges (the UI, for instance, could use some organizing so you're not scrolling right for five minutes before you find the station you want). But the core app is solid. I like that I can listen to a wide variety of programming from a single app. Keep up the good work!
Awesome
Very nice,  though I still like tweeking the old dial searching for a station.  Did not see Cuba listed.  Hope you add more.
replyContent:
Sadly, my all-time favorite shortwave station, Radio Netherlands Worldwide, was closed in 2012. See Wikipedia.

Radio Havana IS in the Global Showcase on-demand next to Argentina and the Latin America Pulse podcast. There are no other English programs that I can find from that region other than the Caribbean island stations with morning news.

content: Two things needed for five stars. First we need to be able to exclude stations. Second we (the user)  need to be able to order the stations as we wish. Also would be nice if we could add stations. Keep up the good work.
replyContent: How do you like the new PlayMix favorites feature?

content: Fantastic. Does what it says in outstanding way.  My most used app.
replyContent: Please spread the word. We are almost to 1000 Pro users.

content: I have try almost everything but this tops. Kudos!
replyContent: Tell your friends!

content: Great universal news tool.
Wide variety of stations to choose from.
replyContent:
Thanks Colin. 

Do you like the new PlayMix feature? If yes, please consider 5 stars. 

Cheers, Steve, 1 Radio News guy

content: Please consider an option to display the stations in lists, so that we could see more stations on one screen. Thank you.
replyContent:
Great idea. Definitely join our Beta Community on Google Plus. See icon link in app way to right.

We are gathering ideas now via our survey linked within the app now.

content: This app needs to be able to save your favorite stations without having to swipe through the entire list.  App also needs to be broken down in sections for easier searching.  Other than that, excellent app.  Enjoy listening to the hourly news and having shortwave right in your hands. Look forward to seeing more updates. Keep up the good work.
replyContent:
You like the new favs?? If, yes how about 5 stars?

Your support is building app momentum.

content: I am addicted to this app. Much clearer than my Grundig shortwave radio. Although, in a catastrophic event, cell towers & Wi-Fi would likely fail, but shortwave would still be "out there" somewhere. Anyhow, I also vote for a sleep timer in your next update if possible.
replyContent:
Thanks - a top idea. Keep those feature ideas coming in! Note the link to the new features survey mixed among the station icons.

We need 150 more listeners to break 1000 paid users mark. Spread the word so we can invest in feature improvements. Sleep timer is in the top five we want to see. Next round will likely be a personalized playlist.

content: A must have for radio enthusiasts.
replyContent: We must thank you for the must have compliment. :-)

content: Excellent app

I think your app is simple, easy to use and thank goodness not cumbersome.  However, as an avid radio listener, i beg you to give a feature that would allow users to search by language and then genre. I hate having to sift through a bunch of non-English stations.
replyContent: Most stations are all English except for the bonus multilingual section segregated way to the side we label with a better icon. We love the external services with 24 x 7 English like Radio Poland. A few stations like Channel Africa and others aren't off to the side being mostly English. Section icons are also being updated.

content: Numerous global sources of news and talk radio. This reminds me of shortwave radio updated to the Internet. Would be even better with presets/favorites.
replyContent:
Boom! You got favorites with our new PlayMix feature. You like? 

If yes, consider 5 stars. Thanks! Steve

content: Best app I have bought.  Works great and is loaded with the best stations from around the world.  Nice work!
replyContent: Love it. Thanks for kudos. Key is loading Pro with quality news stations to which many people actually want to listen.

content: This app provides international and national news.  If you SWL for the content, this is a convenient alternative to the radio. Author is quite responsive to inquiries.
replyContent: Thanks. As a shortwave fan for the "content" not just the treasure hunt, this app makes finding that content easy. Although, I sure have enjoyed finding these often not in any other app (even Tunein) feeds. Or at least buried so you never can find them in other apps.

content: The world's news at your fingertips!! Simple, straitforward, & wonderfully organized! Couldn't ask for anything more!
replyContent: Thanks Larry. Based on app usage stats we are further refining how we order our top hourly headlines (in particular) based on popularity. We do envision a personalized play list too ... but we need to sell some more Pro apps to invest more on a major feature like that.

content: This is now my go to app for my daily news. Looking  forward to additional features.
Everything you could want.
replyContent: Thanks. Please spread the word to radio news lovers.

content: I only see FIVE stations listed, all of which I already get with other apps
replyContent:
Is 1 Radio News now working better for you? If not, email us: comments@1radionews.com
If YES, then please consider more stars! Strong ratings are crucial.

content: Good app. Thank u
replyContent: Thanks. Do you like the new favorites? If yes, please consider 5 stars!

content: Better than expected.
replyContent: With so many niche radio apps adopting invasive advertising that disrupt the experience, we are glad to have you in our family of radio news fans skipping the mobile ads.

content: The Pro app has a good way to go before some will feel its worth the cost. Poor interface, with no menu to speak of (even if you're using a flip board format, you should offer a full menu alternative). There's no way to easily find stations or content of interest. Much still to be desired here. At the same time it does pull in lots of stations from all over the place, all over the world. So, you might want more on the interface, but your payment will help those changes arrive all the sooner. Think of it as an investment ;-)
replyContent:
Is 1 Radio News now working better for you? If not, email us: comments@1radionews.com
If YES, then please consider more stars! Strong ratings are crucial.

content: Great addition to my radio apps,  remind me when my dad use to listen his short wave radio,  great selection  of radio stations.   Developer please add the option to shoose either big icons or just a list with small icons on the side.,  option to save favorites would be great
replyContent:
Update: Wow, now that's much nicer than the first review. :-)

If you are a news lover, looking for English news updates from 30+ countries (like shortwave glory days), then the growing choices on Pro do call for presets and more.

If others are bored by news, definitely do not buy this app.

content: I actually find myself using this more than Tunein, even for the same channels. Well done
replyContent:
Thanks! That's the idea - Make it super simple to change the station among the most popular broadcasters.

Saving 30 seconds to change the channel matters. Also, our app includes most of the English language news stations that "trend" on TuneIn.

All app sales are going into new features, so our next goal is a personal playlist. Please share app!

content: I purchased this awesome app 8 months or less, ago and up till July it was functioning normally. Now it does not go past NPR news and it closes with the error "app has suddenly stopped working". I have done all the troubleshooting I can: uninstalled, reinstalled, tried on three different devices, same result.         ### Edit ###  wonderful support. Easy to talk to and issue has been resolved.
replyContent:
Update: Thanks to your report, we fixed a typo in our playlist and squashed this bug.

We are in direct communication to troubleshoot this first and only report like this. If anyone else is having trouble with 2.1, contact us right away: comments@1radionews.com

Also, if Google offers to submit an error report from a crash, please do so.

content: This app is amazing. It more than replaces my old shortwave radio. No waiting for nightfall, no moving upstairs to get a signal that fades in and out, no stringing lengths of copper wire to capture feint transmissions. What you get are clear broadcasts without distortion and the range of stations is surprising large. Worth every penny for the Pro version.
replyContent:
And if you find more stations or English news podcasts from other international "external" services,  let us know: comments@1radionews.com

There are about ten more potential on-demand daily shows in English from places like Tunisia, Egypt, Vietnam, Bulgaria, Israel, etc. that we *could* add if they add a "podcast" feed or iTunes feed on their site

content: Perfect radio app.  Shortwave radio is dead in North America. This app reminds me of evenings with my portable radio years ago in Angola.
replyContent: When I first got online in 1993, my concept of the Internet was "reception clear shortwave." As a kid I strung wires all over the place and tuned in the world from my small town. Now I helped build the app version of my original conception focus on the power of voice (not just hyped up TV news) going deep around the world. Let's discover together.

content: Brilliant one of my favourite apps
Beyond Awesome
More headline news, more overall stations. Overall an excellent app for newsies.
Decided to go pro. Best few dollars ever spent since short wave over sw radio died.
I give it 5*. Try to improve it more by providing options for stations search and favourite button.
replyContent: We agree. With nearly 200 *new* daily/weekly radio shows on-demand and 200 well curated live streams - favorites or in radio speak "pre-sets" are needed. To invest in new features, please help spread the word about 1 Radio News. Getting to 500 Pro users helped us add on-demand shows beyond headlines. The next 500 will bring us more goodness. :-)

content: Excellent stations!really recommend the pro app.
Easy app to get up to date headlines and programs from around the world. Quick response from support.
Try scanning the radio dial when all you need is current news and you will appreciate this all the more.
replyContent: Exactly. Before I listen to "whatever," I want to first start with the news headlines no matter what time it is. After ten years of easy on-demand Tivo(Tm) watching, this app brings that easy experience to radio.

content: Listen to it every chance I get! Note: add ability to favorite a station. Thats 5star!
replyContent:
How do you like the favorites now? Did we earn 5*s?

...
I would love to have pre-sets, a timer, an alarm clock, and more. Help us get our free version to 50K downloads and we can invest more!  With version 2.1 and many many more on-demand shows the problem of too many choices is real and growing ... even with our careful curation.

content: Just sit back and listen to the world news.
Otherwise it's cool  6/28/15 Update: WBAI works now! Love it, and great support from developers :)
replyContent:
Updated WBAI stream. Glad it works! Everyone, please check out WBAI, a Pacificia public radio station from NYC. Unique. 

Also, we curate the best radio news sources to keep streams working - if a stream fails twice over two days, let us know: comments@1radionews.com   Sometimes stations move there streams.

content: The best world radio app I ever seen. Tons of stations. Works well almost all the time. They even have old time radio and science fiction radio. Simply the best.
replyContent: Thanks Bruno. I thought folks might like some hard to find spoken word stations.

content: This app is great since it takes all of my favorite news feeds and put a them in one place.
replyContent: That's the idea. Changing the station should be quick and easy. What good are 100,000 stations if all the good ones with news are lost in the weeds.

content: I upgraded to the Pro version to get all the stations. It's great to be able to listen to English radio broadcasts from different parts of the world in an easy to use app. One tip for you that I  discovered: You'll see three rows of stations with three each row. To see all the other stations in the Pro version, swipe each row left  several times and you'll see all the stations that way. Well worth the purchase price.

Reminds me of the old shortwave radio days. I would also stay up late at night trying to scratch in some far away station on the AM dial. I enjoy listening to news, current events and arts & culture programming from around the world and this app makes it so easy. If this type of thing interests you do yourself a favour and grab the pro version. For the price of a cup of coffee you get access to so many more sources.
very nice apps
I found exactly what I was looking for, live radio newscast streams.  Thank You.
5 stars.  Keep up the great work.
Sometimes you just want to hear the headlines on demand. And now the live news is great too.

Easily the best Internet radio app I have used--certainly for news. The ability to add your own radio stations by URL and a text-only station list would be useful.  The app is so well done that it would be nice if the selection could be expanded beyond news and talk radio to include such stations as TSF Jazz Belgium,  and Radio Classique, among others for which I have the URLs (some of which are hard won).
replyContent: Fine idea. It is still early days for this bootstrapped app. Spread the word to your news radio loving friends so we can build the user base to drive new features (that still avoids the bloat and confusion with many radio apps).

content: Even works on my Hisense Vision TV last time I tried it using the air mouse.   Really like being able to listen to live streams as well as just news if I want from all over.
Hangs up sometimes when loading, but when it works, it's very entertaining.
replyContent: We carefully select the lowest data using streams for speedy mobile access, but loading delays will happen based on your connection/bandwidth.

content: If you are a news junkie, an old-school shortwave radio listener, or just are in general interested in what the world has to say, you need this app.  News headlines and in-depth news stories from worldwide radio stations, from every corner of the the globe.  Stories and perspectives you won't get from your local media.  Get the Pro version.  You'll be a better world citizen, and a better person for it.
replyContent: Wow, thanks. I told my friends that that your review was so glowing that some might think we paid you to say that. It is heartening to be one of the absolutely top rated radio as well as news apps on Google Play.

content: Love this app as it is exactly what i was looking for.   Easy to navigate as well.  Just needs more stations and then it would be perfect.
replyContent:
Another 20 on the app now in testing. This brings the pro app to 100 unique news/talk/spoken word streams! 

FYI - we are avoiding stations without much original local content (stations with mostly syndicated programs).

content: World news. Works fine, lasts a long time.
Just the best radio app for my international radio listening needs!
I've wanted a variety of viewpoints on the headlines of the moment and this nails it. Thank you!

It's like having a old shortware radio only better because it's digital, you get more stations and there's no static. Listen to news from around the world and in the U.S. Hear news stories outside the main stream that your missing. Great app, thank you.  Works on my old Gingerbread and newer Andoid tablet.
This has most of the major radio news streams in one place.  It replaced several of my older apps, which only had a few sites.

I just switched over from iOS and had a really hard time managing the public broadcasting app in the Android marketplace. My old public broadcasting app simply let me hit play and listen to the headlines at the top of the hour from public sources.   I understand the complexity of the public broadcasting app, but I mostly used it when I was driving. The simplicity of the app fits the bill perfectly! It also seems much more reliable than the actual PB app.   One request! Can you please add more sources??
replyContent: How do you like the favorites? We added scores of new sources. If you love the app now, please consider a five star rating. Thanks, Steve
